subject: pro X pedals issue
description_text:
Hello,

I have tried sending multiple emails on and on fb. I cannot get my pedals
to work. I have updated firmware and software to latest. The leds work, but
no axis movement out of any pedal.

I tried offset and unplug and replug and nothing.

They were fine and I just want to race as its tbe only thing keeping me
from doing so

conversations.body_text: Hi Greg McHargue,  Please first provide a video showing the issue in detail. Then, download ToDesk (no registration required) and share the temporary ID and password with us. We will schedule a convenient time based on your local city time to remotely assist you in resolving the problem.

I have downloaded the todesk app as told from previous email.

I am in buda, tx 78610 central time zone.

On Sat, Sep 6, 2025, 8:31 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Greg McHargue,  If you have time now, I can assist you remotely right away. Please provide me with your ID and verification code.

Device id 884 520 603
87e0jyj6
